ExitWest: In terms of the physical book it's in great shape as it arrived!
In terms of the author and the words and everything that should be in a book, it's definitely different
It's written in the 3rd person rather than through Saeed or Nadia, which is incredibly hard for authors to write in, but Hamid has done so pretty well
It's a very descriptive book that at least I feel has some pointless elements to it, but I'll leave it to future readers to find those
It's one of those books that you kind of don't love, but can't put down
